name: Inner Demon (Harshavardhan Reddy)
description:
Will you be successful in defeating your Inner Demon?

Will The charm of Gated Death work?

Will the demon die? Or will you be taken over?

Find out by playing.

Player and Enemy assets were from: https://chocolate4.itch.io/thatcoolsprite

Tileset was from: https://vimlark.itch.io/town-asset-pack-16x16

the Demon was made by: me(tracing the normal player art)

music was made by: me in Beepbox.co

This game was made by me in around 8 hours for  Trijam #168

NOTE: this is the jam version only. I will release the full version of this game if it gets popular.

(I like this game very much that's why I will release the full version)
